example.code:
PS C:\> Get-EC2VpnConnection -VpnConnectionId vpn-12345678
CustomerGatewayConfiguration : [XML document] CustomerGatewayId : cgw-1a2b3c4d Options : Amazon.EC2.Model.VpnConnectionOptions Routes : {Amazon.EC2.Model.VpnStaticRoute} State : available Tags : {} Type : ipsec.1 VgwTelemetry : {Amazon.EC2.Model.VgwTelemetry, Amazon.EC2.Model.VgwTelemetry} VpnConnectionId : vpn-12345678 VpnGatewayId : vgw-1a2b3c4d
example.description: This example describes the specified VPN connection.

example.code:
PS C:\>$filter = New-Object Amazon.EC2.Model.Filter PS C:\> $filter.Name = "state" PS C:\> $filter.Values = @( "pending", "available" )
PS C:\> Get-EC2VpnConnection -Filter $filter
example.description: This example describes any VPN connection whose state is either pending or available.
This example describes all your VPN connections.
